product_name: Eagle Creek Guide Pro Courier Bag - 2013 Closeout
long_description: A courier-style shoulder bag for urban adventures, the Eagle Creek Guide Pro Courier Bag offers excellent organization for you daily essentials. Zippered main compartment features Smart Travel Security(TM) organization, including an interior mobile phone and electronics pocket, zippered pocket, key fob and pen slot. Main compartment features a zippered closure; zippered padded compartment is perfect for most tablets, netbooks and tablet computers. Top grap handle for easy carrying; adjustable shoulder strap for cross-body carry. Reflective accents increase visibility. Closeout.
short_description: A courier-style shoulder bag for urban adventures, the Eagle Creek Guide Pro Courier Bag offers excellent organization for you daily essentials.
